text:
@realDonaldTrump So now the truth and people who do not agree with you are harassment?  

Here is some harassment then:

#COVID19 is still strong
#TrumpRallyFail 
#TrumpIsNotWell 
#TinyTrumpRally

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
